display.title: Welcome to SKYWARD!
description: Welcome, traveler, to the world of SKYWARD, a modpack on version 1.20.1 centered around space exploration. Here, you will use mods such as Ad Astra in order to conquer the stars around you. SKYWARD is best played as a team against other teams, but can be enjoyed solo or as one big team. Click on the checkmark in order to begin your astral adventures!
